alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Reeves (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 2:54PM CDT until October 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pecos County in southwestern Texas... South central Reeves County in southwestern Texas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southeast of Saragosa, or 33 miles west of Fort Stockton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Stockton, Fort Stockton-Pecos County Airport, and Firestone Test Track. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 219 and 264. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
